item.title: More iPhone 3G Nonsense Uncovered: No Tethering
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: iPhone 3G, the “supposedly” latest and greatest handhled, just continues to amaze me, with its ridiculousness of course. I mean first they dare to call a machine a smartphone that can’t run more than one app a time, need you to send the unit back even for a battery change, fix the glaring mistakes of its predecessor and call them “features” and make you believe that you are getting it all for cheap while covertly telling you that you need a minimum of 2 year 70$ contract to get it and need to pay through every hole for even software updates.

item.title: Tip: Gadgets, Deals And Stuff You Need To Know - Part I
item.author: shantanu@shantanugoel.com (Shantanu Goel)
item.description: If you are a gadget freak like me and can’t resist the temptations to buy the newest toy on the shelves, then you’d obviously want to eek out the maximum you can from whatever budget you have. But while doing so you have to take care of a lot of things. Here is Part I of the few things that I do get the best deals out there while making sure I’m buying the right thing from the right place.
